message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional item. This investment promises to deliver substantial returns and value to your company.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality and features of your product, my budget allows me to only consider offers within the range of $10000 or less. Would you be willing to adjust your price to meet this requirement?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still valuing the product's true worth, I am willing to negotiate. My counteroffer is $12500 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise, ensuring you receive a valuable asset without exceeding your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11000 for the product. This price aligns better with my budget while still acknowledging the value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. In light of your proposal, I am pleased to offer a counter-counteroffer of $11500 for the product. This price aims to bridge the gap between our positions while still reflecting the value of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I am prepared to offer $11000 for the product. This amount reflects a fair compromise considering both our interests.
